website_summaries.verdict: Jogging in these supportive, comfortable shoes is almost like running on a cloud.
pros: Textile upper and lining, supportive mid-foot cage, lace-up closure
Molded heel optimizes Achilles tendon movement
Rubber outsole designed for gripping wet and dry surfaces
cons: May run large, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are amazing! I had foot surgery on my right foot ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing! I had foot surgery on my right foot and broke my left leg in a matter of 6 months so shoes are an issue! These are the only ones I have tried that I can walk in pain free! Worth every penny! Especially for those of us with bad legs and feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Well I had a five star review before but after a month of having them and much inspection I am almost 100% positive that the shoes are fake. The box says that they’re made in a different country there are a lot of imperfections and they just don’t look right. No wonder why they’re so cheap
customer_reviews.author: Schuchemr

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes EVER
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a pair of Ultraboosts forever. I was in my local mall and saw these at their regularly $200 price, so when I found these on Amazon for around $30 less, I jumped on it immediately. They're not only super comfy, bit better attractive as well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Parker

customer_reviews.title: woman's ultra boost
customer_reviews.text: ultra boost = comfort. these shoes are ultra boost. if you don't understand your basically still living as a cave man or woman.
customer_reviews.author: GabrielZ

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sneakers. I ordered one size down and they fit perfectly! These are authentic Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: amykeikei

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fav sneakers right now! I want another pair in a different color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Mastin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of ultra boosts and I have loved them. This pair has a narrower fit -- I am getting blisters. I've tried different socks, reworking the laces and nothing works. I'm disappointed and will have to look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyshine6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like these. Bought to replace the adistar, which i couldn’t find.
customer_reviews.author: ATNola

customer_reviews.title: Great walking/running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable shoe. Looks great and is good for running/walking long distances.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfy! They stretch just enough but don't stretch out. I bought 2 pair. Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Kallen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife complained of painful pressure points on top of foot. Below shoe tongue.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund

customer_reviews.title: They feel like you are running on clouds!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only road running shoe I will wear. They are sometimes hard to find. They are so comfortable and last me at least twice as long as other shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer bump

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: This sizing was very confusing to me. I have owned a dozen pairs of these and never have I seen a width size. I assumed the M was men’s not medium width. They were a gift and they’re way too small. Unfortunately I was unable to return because of the occasion falling out of the set time period. Now I have $200 shoes that don’t fit anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Ultraboost W Running Shoe
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
